abstract: Gary D. Forsee’s resignation came on the heels of news reports last week that the company’s board was seeking to replace him as early as December.
snippet: Gary D. Forsee’s resignation came on the heels of news reports last week that the company’s board was seeking to replace him as early as December.
lead_paragraph: Gary D. Forsee, Sprint Nextel’s chairman and chief executive, resigned yesterday on the heels of news reports last week that the company’s board was seeking to replace him as early as December.

headline.main: Sprint Nextel Chief Resigns, Adding to Line of Departures
headline.print_headline: Sprint Nextel Chief Resigns, Adding to Line of Departures

byline.original: By Laura M. Holson and Matt Richtel

abstract: Is Gary D. Forsee’s departure from Sprint another feather in Ralph V. Whitworth’s cap?
lead_paragraph: Is Gary D. Forsee’s departure from Sprint another feather in Ralph V. Whitworth’s cap?

headline.main: What Did Whitworth Do at Sprint?
